summary: Nick's borrowed money from a loan shark. He's 4 weeks behind. He gets 24 hours to come up with GBP100,000. His mom's a hostage.
cast: Clint Koroan|Fredi 'Kruga' Nwaka|50 Cent|Ashley Walters|Tamer Hassan|Danny Dyer|Brenda Blethyn|Monet Mazur|Phil Davis|Jeremy Zimmermann|Robbie Gee|Nakeba Buchanan|John Forgeham|Andrew Harrison|Nicholas Ball|Bronson Webb|Tony Rohr|Christopher Ryan|Steven Linacre|Clive Russell|Glenn Doherty|Jodi McAllister|Will Bowden|Joe Egan|Jason Devil|Keith-Lee Castle|Blake Ritson|Garry Cooper|Scot Williams|Omid Djalili|Esmé Bianco|Valeria Dragova|Maz Spencer|Pigalle Tavakkoli|Trevor Byfield|Sean Verey|Davinia-Jaylin Sempa|Adam Saint|Jeff Stewart|Alan Ford|Ben Moor|Andrea Newland|Rupert Degas|Joe Moda|Lauren Reading|Robert Stone|Jayson Whiteley
title: Dead Man Running
